name: leadenly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that lacks energy and feeling: At times he could be leadenly solemn. Her stories are leadenly described as "often quite amusing".
More examplesFewer examplesWhy are so many of us permanently, leadenly exhausted?She waited leadenly for the door to be opened and the passengers to bump their way up the aisle ahead of her. If you are still awake at the end of this leadenly tedious three-hour espionage movie, I will be amazed.
